methods.name: getLanguage
methods.comment:
Gets the Language for this object's LanguageID, using the given language
 service to do the lookup.

params.name: languageService
params.comment: The language service to use for language lookup.

throws.comment:
if no Language could be found for this
   object's LanguageID using the given language service.

return.comment:
The Language for this object's LanguageID, using the given language
   service to do the lookup.

   language service to do the lookup.

name: LanguageCompilerSpecPair
comment: Represents an opinion's processor language and compiler.
